name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 6 relics.

v0.6.0
- Fixed bug where you could softlock in the Excess Potions screen
- Fixed energy symbol oddity on the bottom left
- Potion Sack keyboard input: changed the default from some strange keys to I,O,P
- Balance change: Spare Bottle, Recipe Change, Black Tea, Scroll of Purity, Glowing Plant, Withering Strike, Save Valuables, Polymorphism
- 2 common relics Iron Slate & Silent Slate are no longer available.
- Some improvements to KOR localization

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.

Github release (https://github.com/Celicath/GathererMod/releases) can be deprecated soon, so consider moving to Steam Workshop version.
